metadata.title: CVE-2024-47662 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Remove register from DCN35 DMCUB diagnostic collection[Why]These registers should not be read from driver and triggering thesecurity violation when DMCUB work times out and diagnostics arecollected blocks Z8 entry.[How]Remove the register read from DCN35.
